meanings.sent1: Tom saved up his moolas to buy a new bike.
meanings.sent2: She counted her moolas carefully before going shopping.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank was full of shiny moolas.
meanings.sent4: His wallet was overflowing with moolas like a treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: The sound of moolas jingling in his pocket was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: Moolas (verb): To earn or make money.
meanings.sent1: After working hard all week, he finally moolas enough to buy a gift.
meanings.sent2: She moolas by selling handmade crafts online.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel moolas by collecting nuts and trading them for treats.
meanings.sent4: He moolas like a bee, buzzing from one job to another.
meanings.sent5: The farmer moolas from the crops he grows on his land.
